alert.note: Alert for Estill; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 02 at 10:03PM EST until January 03 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Red River at Clay City affecting Powell and Estill Counties. For the Red River...including Clay City...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River at Clay City. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, several roads are impassable in and around Clay City. Some homes are flooded in low lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM EST Sunday the stage was 20.2 feet. - The river crested around 20.3 feet at 7:15 PM Sunday evening. - Forecast...The river has crested and will fall to below flood stage Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. The next statement will be issued by 8 AM.
